Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, south of the Necropolis.
Room.LongDescription: Overland Drive takes a funny turn towards the southeast here. The Necropolis continues along the north side of the road, even past the turn. You can now see the large Manor of Natasha de Allisk to the south. There are two large gates located to the southeast of here that appear to lead into the Manor.
